fullplot: When a young street vendor with a grim home life meets a woman on her way to Paris, they forge an instant connection. He changes all the clocks in Taipei to French time; as he watches Franèois Truffaut's "Les 400 Coups," she has a strange encounter with its now-aging star, Jean-Pierre Leaud.
plot: When a young street vendor with a grim home life meets a woman on her way to Paris, they forge an instant connection. He changes all the clocks in Taipei to French time; as he watches ...
title: What Time Is It There?

tomatoes.consensus: Though it requires patience to view, What Time Is It There?'s exploration of loneliness is both elegant and haunting.
